definition: (used to introduce a logical conclusion) from that fact or reason or as a result
details:
adverb
- (used to introduce a logical conclusion) from that fact or reason or as a result
= synonyms: so
- from that place or from there
= example: from that place or from there
= synonyms: therefrom
- from that circumstance or source
= example: from that circumstance or source
= synonyms: therefrom, thereof
